front.title: Methods for Mitigation of Congestion and Load Issues on RADIUS Servers

author.organization: Deutsches Forschungsnetz | German National Research and Education Network

abstract.t: The RADIUS protocol as defined in [RFC2865] does not have a means to signal server overload or congesition to the clients. This can lead to load problems, especially in a federated RADIUS proxy fabric. This document attempts to fix this.
